TEXT.TITLE: ACME ELECTRIC CORP <ACE> 1ST QTR OCT TWO
TEXT.BODY: Shr 17 cts vs four cts Qtly div eight cts vs eight cts Net 739,000 vs 157,000 Revs 21.1 mln vs 14.5 mln NOTE: 1986 1st qtr adjusted for five pct stock dividend pain in March 1987. Qtly dividend payable December seven to shareholders or record November nine. Reuter
